Questions.Question: Which cartoon features a boy and his dog traveling through time?
Questions.Explanation: In 'The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle' Sherman and Mr. Peabody use their 'WABAC' machine to travel through time.

Questions.Question: In 'Futurama', what organization protects the continuity of time?
Questions.Explanation: The Temporal Integrity Commission was responsible for stopping time paradoxes and maintaining the time stream in 'Futurama'.

Questions.Question: Which animated series follows the adventures of a time-traveling samurai?
Questions.Explanation: Samurai Jack, created by Genndy Tartakovsky, follows the journey of a samurai displaced to the distant future by the shape-shifting demon Aku.

Questions.Question: In 'The Simpsons', who builds a time-traveling toaster?
Questions.Explanation: In the episode 'Time and Punishment', Homer Simpson accidentally creates a time machine out of a toaster.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the time-traveling alien in 'Doctor Who'?
Questions.Explanation: The Doctor, a Time Lord from the planet Gallifrey, travels through time in the TARDIS, a time machine disguised as a police box.

Questions.Question: Who is the famous time-traveling adventurer in 'The Magic School Bus'?
Questions.Explanation: Ms. Frizzle takes her class on magical field trips, including travels through time and space in 'The Magic School Bus'.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon features a boy using a time-traveling wristwatch?
Questions.Explanation: Ben Tennyson uses the Omnitrix, a wristwatch-like alien device that grants him the ability to transform into various alien forms.

Questions.Question: In 'Adventure Time', who is friends with a strange being called Magic Man?
Questions.Explanation: In 'Adventure Time', the main characters Finn and Jake encounter the bizarre and mischievous Magic Man on their adventures.

Questions.Question: Which time-traveling duo consists of a boy and his inventor friend?
Questions.Explanation: In 'Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius', Jimmy and his best friend Carl invent various gadgets, including a time machine.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the time-traveling police officer in 'The Fairly OddParents'?
Questions.Explanation: In the episode 'Channel Chasers', Timmy uses a remote control to travel to different TV shows, including a future where he is a police officer.
